attachments.fallback: #13750 Implemented filter-tabs in pages in services
attachments.text:
## Proposed Changes

Fixes <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/13733|#13733>

• Using filter-tabs component in `ToReceive`, `ToDispatch`, `PurchaseOrders`, `MedicationRequestList` & `IncomingDeleveries`
• Implemented `useBreakpoints` for different screen sizes, `{default: 2 ` or `3, md: 4}`
• Implemented `overflow-x-auto` as failsafe

Tagging: @ohcnetwork/care-fe-code-reviewers

## Merge Checklist

• Add specs that demonstrate the bug or test the new feature.
• Update <https://docs.ohc.network|product documentation>.
• Ensure that UI text is placed in I18n files.
• Prepare a screenshot or demo video for the changelog entry and attach it to the issue.
• Request peer reviews.
• Complete QA on mobile devices.
• Complete QA on desktop devices.

## Summary by CodeRabbit

• New Features  
   • Introduced responsive FilterTabs across Incoming Deliveries, Purchase Orders, Internal Transfers (To Dispatch, To Receive), and Medication Requests.  
   • Added “Show more” dropdown with dynamic visible tab counts based on screen size.  
   • Consolidated tab content into a single, consistent view with preserved filtering and pagination.
• Refactor  
   • Replaced legacy Tabs and dropdown-driven tab management with a unified FilterTabs experience.  
   • Simplified labels to translation-based text (icons removed) and streamlined layout for better overflow handling.  
   • No changes to public APIs; existing URLs and query-based tab behavior remain intact.
attachments.title: #13750 Implemented filter-tabs in pages in services

attachments.text:
*Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.*  
While selecting organizations when creating a questionnaire, there is no option to add all organizations or clear all

*Describe the solution you'd like*  
Add the feature for the user to select all or remove all organizations

*Describe alternatives you've considered*  
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

*Additional context*  
Implement similar to other forms where suitable

attachments.text:
*Describe the bug*  
In appointments page, when choosing filters with keyboard, there is no shortcut to navigate back in the filters options  
Try `>` and then `<`

*To Reproduce*  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to 'Appointments'
2. Click on 'Filters'
3. See error

*Expected behavior*  
Pressing `<` should take the user back to the previous window

*Screenshots*

2025-09-25.21-24-46.mp4 

*Desktop (please complete the following information):*

• OS: Win 10
• Browser Opera
• Version latest

*Smartphone (please complete the following information):*

• Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
• OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]
• Browser [e.g. stock browser, safari]
• Version [e.g. 22]

## *Additional context*  
Also verify in other areas where keyboard navigation is available

attachments.text:
*Describe the bug*  
In appointments page, when choosing filters with keyboard, there is no shortcut to navigate back in the filters options  
Try `>` and then `<`

*To Reproduce*  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to 'Appointments'
2. Click on 'Filters'
3. See error

*Expected behavior*  
Pressing `<` should take the user back to the previous window

*Screenshots*

2025-09-25.21-24-46.mp4 

*Desktop (please complete the following information):*

• OS: Win 10
• Browser Opera
• Version latest

*Smartphone (please complete the following information):*

• Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
• OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]
• Browser [e.g. stock browser, safari]
• Version [e.g. 22]

## *Additional context*  
Also verify in other areas where keyboard navigation is available

Include any other relevant context, links, screenshots, or resources that support your proposed solution.

In Organizations page, in case of multiple org pages, same list is being shown in all pages

*To Reproduce*  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to 'Governance'
2. Click on 'Organizations'
3. Scroll down to 'Pagination'
4. See error

*Expected behavior*  
Fetch correct details according to page number
